biyagama ha katunayaka agalum kalapa dekehi pamanak purappadu 21000k pawathina bawa aarthika sanwardhana niyojya amathi lakshman yapa abewardhana mahatha pawasiya.mita amatharawa anekuth agalum kalapayanhida purappadu pawathina bawa rajaye prawruththi departhumenthuwe eeye (28) pawathi prawruththi sakachchawedi niyojya amathiwaraya ese prakasha kaleya.ema kshethrayen upayana aadayamada ihala gos athi bawath, 2004 wasarata sapekshawa me wasara wana wita eya siyayata 49.5ka ihala yamak bawath hethema penwa dunneya.2004 wasaredi agalum karmanthayen amarikan dolar 790 k ipayu athara eya 2011 wasara wana wita amarikan dolar 4172 aadayamak ipayimata haki wi athi bawada abewardhana mahatha penwa dunneya.agalum karmantha shala wasemin yana bawata athamun gena yana pracharayange kisidu sathyathawayak nomathi bawa pawasana hethema thawath aayojana rasakata illim kara athi bawada pawasiya..
